title: Single Room
description: Cozy single room with a comfortable bed, perfect for solo travelers.
roomDetail: Experience comfort and tranquility in our cozy single room. Designed with solo travelers in mind, this room offers a peaceful retreat with a comfortable bed, a work desk, and essential amenities. Whether you're on a business trip or a solo adventure, this room ensures a restful and enjoyable stay.

title: Double Room
description: Spacious double room with two beds, ideal for couples or friends.
roomDetail: Our spacious double room is perfect for couples or friends looking for a comfortable and inviting space. Two cozy beds, a well-appointed bathroom, and thoughtful amenities make this room the ideal choice for those seeking relaxation and quality time together.

title: Super Suite
description: Luxurious super suite with a private balcony and stunning views.
roomDetail: Indulge in luxury in our super suite, featuring a private balcony with stunning views. This spacious suite is a haven of elegance and comfort. Relax in style, take in the breathtaking vistas, and enjoy the finest amenities for a truly exceptional stay.

title: Deluxe Suite
description: Elegant deluxe suite with a separate living area and modern amenities.
roomDetail: The deluxe suite offers an exquisite experience with a separate living area, modern furnishings, and premium amenities. This room is perfect for travelers looking for sophistication and extra space. Whether you're on a business trip or a leisurely escape, you'll find everything you need for a memorable stay.

title: Honeymoon Suite
description: Romantic honeymoon suite with a Jacuzzi and champagne on arrival.
roomDetail: Celebrate love and romance in our honeymoon suite. Relax in the private Jacuzzi, savor a complimentary bottle of champagne, and create unforgettable memories. This suite is designed for couples seeking a luxurious and intimate escape, where every moment is a special occasion.

title: Family Suite
description: Spacious family suite with multiple bedrooms and a living area.
roomDetail: Our Family Suite is the perfect choice for larger families or groups of friends. It offers spacious accommodations with multiple bedrooms, a generous living area, and a well-equipped kitchenette. Enjoy ample space to relax and unwind, whether you're planning an extended vacation or a weekend getaway. This suite features modern furnishings, cozy decor, and all the amenities you need for a memorable stay. Make yourself at home in the Family Suite and create lasting memories with your loved ones.
